response.overview: A tribute to Pink Floyd’s legendary The Wall live tour, carefully edited to bring the iconic 1980 performance to life. Using clips from various sources of original concert footage, the visuals were synchronized to the live album, allowing us to enjoy an original 1980 The Wall concert with the highest quality original audio available. This project celebrates the artistry and innovation of one of rock’s most unforgettable live productions.
response.title: The Wall Live 1980 Curation
